welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rafael Calzada, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and regional flights within Argentina.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Handles international flights to and from North America and Europe.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Handles international flights to and from South America and other regions.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device. Premium WiFi available for purchase.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at El Palomar Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport
